author: serge
msg: Added existsAddress() method and implementation in AvalonListservManager, so listserv manager can detect whether someone is already a member or not a member when signing on or off.  Prevents error condition and allows for more descriptive bounce message.

author: serge
msg: Handles null listserv address now as is documented as possible.  Grabs the first recipient on the mail's recipient, assuming that this single recipient is the listserv address.

author: serge
msg: Changed to deliver to command line specified username, rather than to prasanna.

author: serge
msg: Added check to always put File.separator at the end of a destination. Otherwise repositories tend to get corrupt.

author: serge
msg: Converted from JavaMail 1.1.3 to JavaMail 1.2 FCS
